topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b1baf6368727d5bda0100#post_543b1baf6368727d5bda0100

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b1c166368723f01a80200#post_543b1c166368723f01a80200
I cried when I was watching Cryotic play the walking deads season finale.

He had to kill Kenny cuz he was losing it, And I cried like a fucking fountain.

I know Kenny is a douche but he was a character that's been there for so long, he was there when everyone else from your passed died, and he even apologized for him being so messed up before he died and that just made me so fucking sad and depressed.
